title: Who tf thought it was a good idea to put challengers on the same teams as gold and bronzes
body:
in twitch rivals?

fr, anyone who isn't at least diamond on the winning team didn't earn shit and got the money for free

and any challengers/masters on a losing team with golds and below got cheated out of a chance to win

There should be a shitter bracket and a high elo bracket. Why is a 3-season hardstuck gold on the same team as Yassuo?
